Package punktiert.GPUPhysics

Interface Summary
BehaviorInterface abstract interface for implementing particle behaviors implement this interface for any new behavior by Karsten Schmidt: toxi.physics.behaviors.ParticleBehavior
 

Class Summary
BAttraction basic Attractor class, based on toxi.physics.behaviors.AttractionBehavior by Karsten Schmidt applies a force based on distance to the passed in VParticle add this behavior to the VPhysics instance
BConstantForce applies a force to the passed in VParticle add this behavior to the VPhysics instance
BVortex basic Attractor class, based on toxi.physics.behaviors.AttractionBehavior by Karsten Schmidt applies a force based on distance to the passed in VParticle add this behavior to the VPhysics instance
BWander basic wander-algorythm
BWorldBox can be used as a framing wrap- or bouncing box for your physics engine or VParticle for convinience use one of the VPhysics constructors
Particle An individual 3D particle for use by the VPhysics and VSpring classes. the functionality can be extended by applying different behaviors OpenCL integration with the help of rotbeer (c) 2012 Phil Pratt-Szeliga, Syracuse University Rootbeer is licensed under the MIT license, https://github.com/pcpratts/rootbeer1
Physics A particle physics engine using Verlet integration based on: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Verlet_integration http://www.teknikus.dk/tj/gdc2001.htm this class builds on Karsten Schmidt's toxi.physics.VerletPhysics class, http://toxiclibs.org ; OpenCL integration with the help of rotbeer (c) 2012 Phil Pratt-Szeliga, Syracuse University Rootbeer is licensed under the MIT license, https://github.com/pcpratts/rootbeer1 punktiert written by Daniel Koehler - 2013 www.lab-eds.org for feedback please contact me at: daniel@lab-eds.org
Spring A spring class connecting two GPUParticles in space.
